name: FoxSpeed
short_description:
Free Internet Accelerator that really works, single use, you might gain up to 15% speed and 17% connection stability, lowering your ping for gaming!

It also helps to maximize the Throughput
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Throughput
of your internet connection, 

FEATURES:
Optimization of the following:
TCP/IP 
DNS
WinSock
Internet
CPU
NETSH

Works on ANY and ALL internet connection types:
Cable, Wifi, 3G even Fax modem!

That's because it modifies the way Windows manages connections, using a bit more resources in an efficiently way.

Single use, no installation needed. 
Requires .Net Framework 4.

Here are some sites where you can test speed:
http://www.speedtest.net
http://www.pingtest.net
http://myspeed.visualware.com

You can help this proyect
I'm accepting donations
email me a jadjkorn64 at gmail dot com
Please spread the word.

Known Issues:
False Positive detection by some AV
See Discussion page for more info.
